text: Ana ne'mofo avufgaregatira rumsa huno, krisolaitie nehaza haveretima nehiaza huno rumsa hu'ne. Hagi avugosafintira kopasi'namo'ma nehiaza huno rumarave nehigeno, avurgafintira tosi tavi'mo'ma nehiaza huno rugananini hu'ne. Azamo'ene agiamo'enena masave freza eri avugosa hu'naza bronsigna nehigeno, agerumofo agasasamo'a rama'a vahe'mokizmi zamagerumofo agasasamo'ma hiaza hu'ne.
